title: AI x Creation
desc: Integrating AIGC technology with the Camera to unlock new possibilities for users' content, inspire greater creative expression, and build a more dynamic and engaging creative community.

title: Camera Stickers
desc: By designing fun and engaging stickers, we introduce new interactive experiences between users and provide attractive decorations for their creations, ultimately enhancing the quality of user posts.

title: TikTok Effects
desc: Helping users discover and experience exciting effects on TikTok, delivering a delightful creative experience through effects and increasing content creation and engagement.
